https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9dus2xJ2DABtYwNr8PELcwpAwSC.jpg Burgos depicts a mother's search for her desaparecido. Ms. Lorna Tolentino plays Editha Burgos, mother of missing activist-farmer Jonas Burgos played by Rocco Nacino. The deeply religious Edith is a member of the House of Prayer, the Secular Order of Discalced Carmelites. Burgos
